duties_responsibilities.duty: Act as a liaison between the Internal Logistics Department, Transport Utilization Department, and Trailer Utilization Team.
Coordinate all aspects of customer logistics and product transportation.
Utilize strong Excel skills, including pivot tables and VLOOKUP's, to work with large data sets.
Support inventory and supply chain operations.
Manage transportation and logistics support, with experience in 3PL operations.
Work remotely and independently to fulfill the responsibilities of the role.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Logistics, Supply Chain Management, or related field
